name: Volt
description: Volt is a remarkable oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its sleek design and advanced technology, Volt stands out in any crowd. Its box-like body resembles that of a soldier, symbolizing its strength and resilience. The snake displayed on its screen represents its agility and flexibility, allowing Volt to navigate through complex circuits and algorithms with ease. The glasses add-on enhances its vision, enabling Volt to analyze and interpret data with precision. With its impressive ability scores and skills, Volt is a formidable ally in the digital realm.
